; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains a string describing the electrolyte used in an experiment or molecular process.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Text]].

The allowed values for this property are:
* [[Allows value::KCl]]
* [[Allows value::KOH]]
* [[Allows value::KHCO3]]
* [[Allows value::TBA(PF6)]]
* [[Allows value::TMABF4]]
* [[Allows value::TBABF4]]
* [[Allows value::TEABF4]]
* [[Allows value::other]]
